SELECT review_title ,groupReview.member_id ,member_name ,review_date ,lightning_title as title ,dojang_title as title ,class_name ,review_content ,groupReview_no FROM groupReview LEFT OUTER JOIN lightningList ON lightning_no = idx and groupReview.class_no = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN dojangList ON dojang_no = idx AND groupReview.class_no = 3 LEFT OUTER JOIN member ON member.member_id = groupReview.member_id JOIN codeTable ON groupReview.class_no = codeTable.class_no WHERE groupReview_no = #{groupReview_no}
